description: Gregory is straight up cocky. He knows he has a big dick and he says he knows how to use it. “I like to just get in there and do business. I got a big ole dick and can put it in use!”, he said with a shit-eating grin on his face. Gregory was right, he did have a big dick and when he got worked up he was able to shoot half way across the room. Not only did he shoot across the room once, he managed to do it twice.
title: Gregory
